      • update

        public Attachment update(Attachment attachment)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Persist attachment to database. The localPath member will not be set to null (removed). Please use the removeLocalPath(Attachment) method to set the localPath to null.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IDaoHelper<Attachment>
        Parameters:
        attachment -
        Returns:
        the attachment
        Throws:

      • removeLocalPath

        public Attachment removeLocalPath(Attachment attachment)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Removes this attachments local path. The localPath member cannot be set to null (removed) from the update method. This is to protect from overriding a local path value when we pull updates for this attachment from the server since localPath does not come from the server and will always be null.
        Parameters:
        attachment -
        Returns:
        the attachment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
